---
config:
  layout: elk
---
flowchart LR
 subgraph NeoPixel["Adafruit NeoPixel Stick"]
        NEO5V["5V (Power)"]
        NEOGND["GND"]
        NEODIN["DIN (Data In)"]
  end
 subgraph ESP32["ESP32-S3 DevKitC-1"]
        ESP32V3V["3.3V (Power)"]
        ESP325V["5V (Power)"]
        ESP32GND["GND"]
        ESP32GPIO9["GPIO 9 (I2S_DIN)"]
        ESP32GPIO10["GPIO 10 (I2S_DOUT)"]
        ESP32GPIO11["GPIO 11 (I2S_WS)"]
        ESP32GPIO12["GPIO 12 (I2S_BCK)"]
        ESP32GPIO13["GPIO 13 (Amplifier Shutdown, Optional)"]
        ESP32GPIO14["GPIO 14 (NeoPixel Data)"]
  end
 subgraph Microphone["INMP441 Microphone"]
        MICVCC["VCC (3.3V)"]
        MICGND["GND"]
        MICSD["SD (Data Out)"]
        MICSCK["SCK (Bit Clock)"]
        MICWS["WS (Word Select)"]
  end
 subgraph MAX98357_Amp["MAX98357 Amp"]
        MAXVIN["VIN (Power Input)"]
        MAXGND["GND"]
        MAXDIN["DIN (Data In)"]
        MAXLRC["LRC (Left/Right Clock)"]
        MAXBCLK["BCLK (Bit Clock)"]
        MAXSD["SD (Shutdown)"]
        MAXOUTP["Positive Output"]
        MAXOUTN["Negative Output"]
  end
 subgraph Speaker["38mm Speaker"]
        SpeakerP["\+ Terminal"]
        SpeakerN["\- Terminal"]
  end
    ESP32V3V --> MICVCC & MAXVIN
    ESP325V --> NEO5V
    ESP32GND --> MICGND & MAXGND & NEOGND
    ESP32GPIO10 --> MAXDIN
    ESP32GPIO9 --> MICSD
    ESP32GPIO12 --> MAXBCLK & MICSCK
    ESP32GPIO11 --> MAXLRC & MICWS
    ESP32GPIO14 --> NEODIN
    MAXOUTP --> SpeakerP
    MAXOUTN --> SpeakerN
    ESP32GPIO13 --> MAXSD
